description:
Project Description

Imagine a world where all your mobility needs are conveniently accessed through an app on your smartphone and delivered with zero emissions, zero ownership, and zero accidents.

This is the reality the automotive industry is waking up to today. It is our mission to design and co-create products and services, empowering our customers to make the transformation to sustainable mobility.

LUXOFT is one of the major software services companies world-wide. We deliver professional software services in multiple business verticals such as finance, automotive, and digital transformation. Supporting large vehicle manufacturers in the area of development, production and aftersales is LUXOFT's ambition.

The software inside a vehicle was traditionally expected to be a very controlled and self-contained environment. Equipping cars with perception and machine intelligence changes a lot in the overall picture of the vehicle manufacturer. LUXOFT's goal is to empower our customers, with deep domain knowledge and smart solutions, to develop cars of the future. Great mechanical engineering is not the only criteria anymore for delivering the best cars in the world. Using state of the art software technologies are key to provide the requested user experience.

Our customer is a market leader which fulfills development, production and integration of electronic systems that enable access to vehicles, control driving authorization and ensure the availability of security and comfort features within the vehicle.

Join our team of enthusiastic and experienced software developers and develop software for future vehicles of a renowned global automotive manufacturer. Develop challenging features that will be used on a daily basis by millions of drivers once the next generation of vehicles hits the roads!

Responsibilities:

Git management for several repositories of Linux based and Realtime subsystems artifacts (build images)
Jenkins management and task scheduling
Manage CI/CD pipelines in an internal tool
Merge C/C++ code git commits
Run/create/adapt test suites
Writing the scripts and tools (bash, PowerShell, Python) needed to automate the integration and testing process

Skills:

- SW engineering background
- Previous experience as a Software Integrator (> 2years)
- CI/CD experience
- Jenkins
- Scripting (Bash, Python, Batch)
- Git
- Merging experience in C/C++
- Experience in Linux OS

PLC Programmer wanted
We are ready to welcome to our team a colleague with practical experience in control systems programming - Siemens (Beckhoff) and system commissioning. As we are currently working on many projects abroad (Germany, Czech Republic, Slovenia, Austria), we are looking for a person who sees traveling as an added value and is willing to lead their own team. If you want to put your language skills into practice, this job position is right for you as it requires active knowledge of English and/or German.
What will you do?

Develop, deploy, and test PLC programs in the segment of the coating industry
Optimize and maintain PLC solutions
Design technical solutions, and provide support with the preparation and implementation of projects
Create detailed documentation for delivered solutions
Responsible for software functionality, the safety of controlled devices, software optimization, adherence to schedule, preparation of technical documentation

Why join our team?

Working on projects for major customers within the EU
Flexible working hours
Daily communication in a foreign language
Direct communication with company executives
4 sick days
annual bonus
Opportunity to travel within the EU
Multisport card which grants access to gyms, studios, and swimming pools
What do we expect?

Beckhoff TwinCAT – advanced
Siemens TIA Portal – advanced
SIMATIC STEP 7 – advanced
Microsoft Excel - advanced
English – Upper Intermediate (B2) and/or German – Upper Intermediate (B2)
We are looking for a new team member who
Graduated from university/secondary school in the field of electrical engineering or automation
Has previous experience with control software or automation (at least 2 years)
Good command of programming languages such as TwinCAT or STEP7
Is familiar with electrical engineering
Certificate of professional competence in electrical engineering (§21 minimum)
Is a responsible team player with analytical thinking
Speaks English and/or German fluently – excellent oral and written communication skills
Is willing to travel (outside Slovakia) and to work in the industrial environment
Is proactive and eager to learn
Is able to work independently and is detail-oriented

The minimum gross monthly base salary for this role is 2500 EUR full-time. Please note this is a minimum salary and our compensation packages are based on your professional experience and qualifications.
Interested?
Get in touch with Diana Pichler- dpichler.ext@i4industry.eu and come work with us at i4Industry.
About i4Industry
i4Industry offers customer-tailored services that cover the entire cycle from the design and assembly of paint shops to their programming, maintenance, and servicing. Our company is a reliable and experienced partner in the field of industrial automation providing innovative technology with a seamless user experience. Thanks to our extensive portfolio of services and products our customers are able to significantly enhance the dynamics of their processes while saving time and money. Our flagship product is inSight, a comprehensive software solution for Industry 4.0, professional visualization software for complex control, configuration, and monitoring of industrial coating technologies

We are looking for a Data Engineer responsible for designing, building, and maintaining the infrastructure and systems that enable the collection, storage, and analysis of large sets of data. This can include tasks such as creating and optimizing data pipelines, designing and implementing data storage solutions, and ensuring data quality and security. Will often work closely with Data Scientists and other stakeholders to understand their data needs and design solutions that meet those needs. Strong technical skills, particularly in programming and database management, are typically required for this role.

Data Engineer mandatory skills and experience
Some essential skills and experience for a Data Engineer include:

Strong programming skills, particularly in languages such as Python, Java, or Scala.

Experience with big data technologies such as Hadoop, Spark, or Apache Kafka.

Proficiency in SQL and experience with database management systems such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, or Oracle.

Familiarity with cloud computing platforms such as AWS, Azure, or GCP.

Understanding of data warehousing concepts and data modeling techniques.

Knowledge of data integration, ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) and ELT (Extract, Load, Transform) processes.

Experience with data governance and data security best practices.

Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to troubleshoot and debug complex systems.

Excellent communication skills, as Data Engineers often need to work closely with other teams and stakeholders.

Familiarity with Agile development methodologies and experience working in a collaborative, cross-functional environment.

Having experience with Machine Learning or Data Science is a plus but not mandatory for the role of Data Engineer.

¿A qué nos dedicamos?
Inired es una organización orientada al suministro de servicios avanzados de gestión de la información para empresas y organismos oficiales. Gestiona desde el origen del dato, con procesos de digitalización y automatización, hasta el final del su ciclo de vida con el análisis y explotación de la información.

¿Nuestra misión?
Nuestro objetivo es proporcionar las mejores soluciones para la gestión eficaz de los procesos y acompañar en la transformación digital de las organizaciones. Inired está integrada por profesionales experimentados en la implantación de soluciones de gestión de la información y capacitados para llevar a cabo, con garantía de éxito, los proyectos que se nos confían.

Para conseguirlo nos apoyamos en lo que consideramos pilares fundamentales:
Nuestros clientes
Nuestros profesionales
Nuestro entorno social

"Queremos que sientas que esta es tu casa. Si lo que quieres es trabajar en una empresa donde puedas crecer personal y profesionalmente, este es tu hogar".

¿Qué te ofrecemos?
Teletrabajo
Horario flexible
Formación continua adaptada a tus necesidades
Aprendizaje constante formando parte de un equipo experimentado
Buen ambiente de trabajo y seguridad laboral
Salario acorde a tu experiencia

¿Qué es lo que esperamos de ti?
¡Que tengas habilidades técnicas sólidas! y ¡Que tengas capacidades en .NET!

¡Que seas capaz de solucionar problemas informáticos, que tengas buenas habilidades de comunicación y de trabajo de equipo, y que estés dispuesto a aprender y actualizarse continuamente en una industria que evoluciona rápidamente!

Además, se espera que tengas una ética profesional fuerte y que seas responsable y confiable en el manejo de información y sistemas sensibles.

En resumen, esperamos un profesional con conocimientos técnicos, capacidad de resolución de problemas y habilidades de comunicación efectivas.

Requisitos
Formación Reglada.
Experiencia entre 1 y 3 años.
Experiencia en el desarrollo de aplicaciones web en C#, HTML, JavaScript, VBScript/ASP, .NET, API REST, ASP.Net, .Net Core o Xamarin Forms.
Experiencia trabajando con MS SQL Server y MySQL Conocimiento de prácticas y procedimientos para el ciclo de vida completo de diseño de software.
Capacidad para ser perseverante, trabajar en equipo y tener amplia curiosidad por el aprendizaje y la formación continua.
Experiencia trabajando en un entorno de desarrollo ágil.
Se valorarán:
Experiencia y conocimiento en programación y gestión de BBDD.
Conocimientos en otras tecnologías.

Tareas - ¿Cuáles serán tus funciones?
Realización de toma de requisitos y diseños funcionales.
Diseño, construcción y prueba de soluciones en base a las especificaciones técnicas definidas.
Ejecución de pruebas.
Velar por el cumplimiento de la calidad del código.
Estimación y reporting del estado del proyecto.
Identificación de riesgos en la calidad/eficiencia/plazos y propuesta de medidas de mitigación.

Soft skills
Buenas habilidades de comunicación verbal y escrita.
Proactividad y dinamismo.
Orientación a objetivos, resultados y satisfacción del usuario.
Trabajo en equipo.
Excelente atención a la precisión y el detalle.
Buena capacidad de resolución de problemas y pensamiento lógico.
Disposición para investigar problemas y aplicar soluciones adecuadas.
Orientación a la calidad.
Adaptabilidad al cambio.

Idiomas
Inglés medio (B1)

We are a digitally native technology services company where innovation, design and engineering meet scale. We use some of the latest technologies in the digital and cognitive field to empower organizations in every aspect.

Right now, we are looking for Golang Developers to join our team at Globant!

You Will Get The Chance To
Work with professionals who have created some of the most revolutionary solutions in their fields.
Make an impact. Work in large-scale projects globally.
Develop your career in our Studios. Each Studio represents deep pockets of expertise on the latest technologies and trends and delivers tailored solutions focused on specific challenges.
Develop your career within an industry or multiple industries.
Work in the city you want, and be nourished by cultural exchanges.
Be empowered to choose your career path: we have more than 600 simultaneous projects, so you can choose where and how to work.
Be part of an agile pod. Driven by a culture of self-regulated teamwork, each team -or POD- works directly with our customers with a full maturity path that evolves as they increase speed, quality and autonomy.

What Will Help You Succeed
Believe and love what you do.
Build bridges & open doors.
Enjoy solving problems.
Being capable of taking a step back to look at a bigger picture.
Intermediate English skills.
Good understanding of Golang, especially concurrency, unit testing. Having experience with libraries like gorm, go kit, testify, etc., will be welcome!
Besides Golang, it is very important to have a good background on backend technologies in general, such as are microservices, cloud computing (AWS, GCP, Azure, others), REST, gRPC and Protobuf, Docker, CI/CD, Kubernetes, message brokers, monitoring tools, among others.
Good knowledge on different database engines both, SQL and NoSQL
Keep scalability in mind, always.

At Globant we believe that an inclusive culture and a diverse environment makes us stronger. We encourage people to have an inclusive spirit as our global footprint expands. We seek to generate a place of inspiration and growth for everyone. A safe space, based on equity as a value, where everyone's careers can be promoted and developed in the same way. There is no innovation without diversity and there is no improvement without plurality.

This job be filled from Anywhere in Ecuador.

Are you ready?

Job Segment: Developer, Engineer, Equity, Nursing, Cloud, Technology, Finance, Healthcare, Engineering

Job Segment: Developer, Cloud, Testing, Engineer, Equity, Technology, Finance, Engineering

Company Overview

At Motorola Solutions, we believe that everything starts with safety. It’s the constant that empowers people to confidently move forward. It can fill a flight or sell out a stadium. It can care for a patient or graduate a class.

As a global leader in public safety and enterprise security, we create and connect the technologies that help to keep people safe where they live, learn, work and play. Our integrated technology ecosystem unifies critical communications, video security and access control, and command center software, enabling collaboration in more powerful ways.

At Motorola Solutions, we’re ushering in a new era in public safety and security. Bring your passion, potential and talents to a career that matters.

Department Overview

Motorola Solutions provides trusted security solutions to the global market through its Video Security and Access Control Division. Motorola Solutions designs develop and manufactures video analytics, network video management software and hardware, surveillance cameras, and access control solutions. Motorola’s solutions have been installed at thousands of customer sites, including school campuses, transportation systems, healthcare centers, public venues, critical infrastructure, prisons, factories, casinos, airports, financial institutions, government facilities, and retailers.

Job Description

As a member of the Sales Engineering Department, the Sales Engineer will work closely with the Sales Organization to develop and position solutions involving Motorola Solutions products.

The Sales Engineer is responsible for technical aspects of the sales process and works closely with the Sales Department involved to develop and position solutions involving Video Security & Access control Division products, writing specs for tenders, also answering to tenders, driving product tests and complex scenarios and internal/external training among others.

During the needs analysis process, confirm that the products meet the prospect’s requirements and assist in technical qualifications. Throughout the proposal process, articulate the technology and demonstrate Motorola’s solutions to both business and technical users. Position Motorola products relative to competition and formulate system designs that conform to both technical and budgetary requirements.

As this is an international position, international travelling may be required.

Your key responsibilities will include:
Effectively disseminate product knowledge by providing thorough training to Sales Teams when required.
Manufacturing Representatives, Integrators, and End-Users
Support Sales Teams in responding to RFP’s and designing, specifying, and quoting systems
Develop and maintain strong relationships with Sales Teams, customers, and partners
Collaborate with the Technical Support team in providing post-sales support to customers
Have positive attitude and can properly manage time and tasks
Perform related duties as assigned
Validate from a technical point of view any quote delivered by ISR team.
Onsite activities including international travelling when required.

Basic Requirements
5+ years’ experience in Sales Engineering for a technology company
Strong understanding of the video surveillance, body worn cameras and access control market
Self-motivated and focused individual with a passion for technology and an aptitude for customer satisfaction
Excellent verbal and written communication skills in:
English
Excellent presentation skills, especially with remote technologies such as teleconference.
Possesses strong analytical and troubleshooting skills
Has a pleasant, friendly style of verbal and written communication
Driving License and Car are a must.

Technical:
Intimate knowledge and experience with Windows troubleshooting tools and techniques
Excellent knowledge of networking principles and IP communication
Experience with computer hardware configuration and troubleshooting
Experience with network equipment configuration and troubleshooting

Preference will be given to candidates with the following skills and experience:
Experience in access control
College degree or diploma of technology
Prior experience in surveillance industry
Microsoft and/or Cisco certifications
Certification for any competitive products

Travel Requirements

Relocation Provided

Position Type

Referral Payment Plan

In MondoSpedizioni siamo alla ricerca di una figura, fortemente motivata ed appassionata, da inserire all’interno del nostro nuovo team tech.

TL;TR

Linguaggio e Framework: PHP 8.x e Symfony
Competenze: OOP, DDD, Clean Code, Design Pattern, Testing
Sede di lavoro: Full Remote o Ibrido
Contratto: Tempo indeterminato, RAL da 25k a 42k in base all’esperienza (ma con un pò di flessibilità per la persona giusta).

Lavoro

La figura quindi:
si dedicherà alla progettazione dei nuovi servizi API con l’obiettivo di dismettere il legacy in breve tempo;
dovrà sviluppare codice di alta qualità comprensivi di test;
lavorerà in full remote o smart working: ci vedremo in ufficio qualche volta per berci un caffè, fare due chiacchiere, fare pair programming e pranzare tutti assieme;

Team

Il Team Tech è di nuova costituzione con diverse competenze di alto livello. Stiamo riprogettando per intero il back-end ed il front-end (compreso la nuova visual identity dell’azienda).

Abbiamo un’organizzazione orizzontale (non piramidale) e ci sforziamo di essere il più autonomi possibili.

Siamo focalizzati sulla metodologia Lean.

Architettura

Il backend è API first (RESTful), in PHP 8.x e Symfony con metodologia DDD.

Siamo in piena transizione da un’architettura legacy on-premise ad AWS, lavorando con Terraform per la costruzione.

Abbiamo adottato PHP come linguaggio di riferimento, ma abbiamo alcuni servizi in Go.

Tutti i nostri nuovi ambienti sono realizzati utilizzando docker, sia per lo sviluppo che per la produzione.

Sperimentiamo nuove tecnologie ed il cambiamento e l’innovazione sono alla base della filosofia del nostro nuovo team.

Requisiti basilari

Forte attenzione alla qualità del codice, alle prestazioni ed all’architettura: Clean Code, Testing, Pipeline non sono buzzword ma il cuore del nostro nuovo progetto.
Conoscenza di PHP 8
Conoscenza di MySQL
Conoscenza di GIT
Grande passione, motivazione e voglia di crescita

Requisiti preferenziali

Buona conoscenza di RabbitMQ

Perché candidarti

Abbiamo un mercato da rivoluzionare, in un’epoca dove le spedizioni sono diventate il cuore del nostro commercio, anche al dettaglio;
Cultura di startup ma in una società consolidata e robusta;
Siamo in piena creazione dei nostri servizi, il tuo contributo sarà determinante!
Budget per partecipazione a conferenze, corsi online o libri;
Portatile Apple aziendale;

Come candidarsi

Invia un’email a jobs@mondospedizioni.com con il tuo CV, il link al tuo profilo linkedin e nel caso tu ne sia fornito, il link al tuo account Github.

Iter di assunzione

Verrà effettuato uno screening delle candidature da parte del CTO e del Lead Backend;
Viene organizzato un primo meet di presentazione di 15/20 minuti per una conoscenza iniziale;
Al candidato che desidera proseguire verrà somministrato un esercizio da fare in autonomia (non richiediamo attività che possano richiedere più di 2-3 ore) con cui presentarsi al colloquio tecnico (in presenza o su meet a seconda delle disponibilità del candidato);
Un terzo ed ultimo colloquio con il management aziendale per la definizione dell’offerta.

Chi siamo

MondoSpedizioni è leader a livello nazionale nel mercato dei servizi di spedizione online.

Fondata nel 2002, la nostra azienda offre servizi di spedizione online dei maggiori corrieri. I punti di forza che guidano il successo dell’azienda sono il servizio clienti in house, la qualità del servizio offerto, l’attenzione al cliente attraverso il contatto diretto e la ricerca della semplicità nella fruizione dei servizi.
La nostra azienda è in veloce e continua crescita e per questo stiamo ampliando il reparto tech con diverse nuove figure.

---
Il presente annuncio è rivolto ad entrambi i sessi, ai sensi delle leggi 903/77 e 125/91, e a persone di tutte le età e tutte le nazionalità, ai sensi dei decreti legislativi 215/03 e 216/03.

Location

Our SaaS Sales Engineer will be an integral part of our Sales team in EMEA. This role is based remotely in Ireland .

Who We Are

We enable greatness through the cloud. We thrive on working with fast growing companies around the world to solve both essential and advanced cloud challenges. DoiT provides intelligent technology that simplifies and automates cloud usage, alongside expert consultancy and unlimited technical support, all at no extra cost to our customers. Join our mission where you’ll work remotely with a committed, experienced, and global team in a collaborative and supportive culture. We are an award-winning strategic partner of Google Cloud and AWS, we provide intelligent technology, expert consultancy and unlimited technical support for customers across more than 70 countries.

The Opportunity

DoiT is looking for a seasoned, technically adept Sales Engineer to lead by example in defining/executing the technical sales process for our public cloud management SaaS products. In this role you will describe and demonstrate how our products help companies to transform themselves using the public cloud and its service offerings (AWS, GCP, etc.)

Responsibilities
Work in conjunction with the sales team as a key technical advisor and advocate for DoiT while mapping product and technology value to the prospect’s needs.
Implement strategies to improve win rates, beat the competition, and develop stronger technical buyer relationships.
Develop and deliver engaging demonstrations in collaboration with our Sales, Marketing and Product teams to both business and technical users.
Understand and implement technical sales strategies based on competitive selling, especially in larger enterprises.
Understand and manage complex technical sales processes in a complex IT environment with multiple departments and stakeholders.
Present to prospects, customers and partners, at external events, conferences, seminars, etc.
Contribute to systems and tools to provide key business information and metrics to highlight performance and effectiveness.
Identify use-case patterns among prospects (and in the market), creating business cases for expansion and increased product focus
Build and maintain strong relationships with the Product Team, advocate for technology investments in areas focused on new opportunities for growth

Qualifications
5+ years experience at B2B SaaS software company in a pre-sales engineering role selling into both enterprise and commercial accounts globally.
An understanding of ITSM eco-systems and prominent solutions within them, such as: DataDog, Chef, Ansible, Puppet, New Relic, ServiceNow, AlertLogic etc.
Experience working with Amazon Web Services (AWS) or Google Cloud Platform (GCP) and can speak to the most common problems associated with their operation.
The ability to take complex pieces of technology and explain them in a simple and easy to understand way.
Excellent verbal, written, presentation and interpersonal communication skills.
Experience building strong operational and collaborative relationships with people in distributed teams and locations
Previous experience working with/presenting to executive level prospects and customers.
Experience with modern technical selling best practices and selling in a competitive environment, including implementing new or improved trial, demo, and RFx processes.
Proven track record of success in a fast growing and scaling business.

Are you a Do’er?

Be your truest self. Work on your terms. Make a difference. We are home to a global team of incredible talent who work remotely and have the flexibility to have a schedule that balances your work and home life. We embrace and support leveling up your skills professionally and personally.

What does being a Do’er mean? We’re all about being entrepreneurial, pursuing knowledge and having fun! Click here to learn more about our core values .

Sounds too good to be true? Check out our Glassdoor Page .

We thought so too, but we’re here and happy we hit that ‘apply’ button.
Unlimited PTO
Flexible Working Options
Health Insurance
Parental Leave
Employee Stock Option Plan
Home Office Allowance
Professional Development Stipend
Peer Recognition Program

Digitale Produkte, Apps und Webprojekte sind die Welt, in der du arbeiten möchtest.

Dich begeistern Technologie und Design, aber du möchtest selbst kein Coding-Spezialist:in werden?

Dann ist die Rolle eines Product Owners genau das Richtige für dich.

Wir, die Digitale Leute School, bilden Product Owner in unseren Bootcamps aus und vermitteln sie in Einsteigerpositionen.

Unser nächster Kurs startet im Januar 2023 und wir haben noch Plätze frei! Starte als Quereinsteiger:in, Studienabsolvent:in in oder Associate Product Owner die Product Management Weiterbildung und finde dann deine erste Stelle.

Aufgaben

Steuerung von Entwicklungsteams

Als Product Owner steuerst du dein Team im Scrum- oder Kanban-Prozess. Du lernst, wie die Regeltermine Daily, Refinement, Planning, Grooming, Review, Retrospektive funktionieren und was von dir als Product Owner erwartet wird.

User Stories & Backlog

Das wichtigste Werkzeug des Product Owners ist der Product Backlog. Du lernst wie du gute User Stories & Epics schreibst und sie im Backlog in eine sinnvolle Reihenfolge bringst.

Testing & Qualitätssicherung

Sobald User Stories von den Entwickler:innen fertig umgesetzt wurden, müssen diese getestet und live gestellt werden. Du lernst, wie du selbst Softwareprodukte zur Abnahme testen kannst und wie du diesen Prozess organisierst.

Produktvision & Stakeholder-Kommunikation

Ein Produkt braucht eine mittel- bis langfristige Ausrichtung. Mit einem „Product Vision Statement“ oder der “Working Backwards Methode” beschreibst du die ideale Produktbeschaffenheit aus Sicht der Kund:innen. Das bildet die Grundlage, um die Produktziele im Unternehmen zu kommunizieren.

Produkt- & User Experience Design

Nutzerzentriertes Design von Software ist zentral für den Erfolg jedes digitalen Produkts. Du erlernst die Grundlagen von Usability & UX-Design und bekommst Werkzeuge an die Hand, wie du Prototypen entwickeln und mit UX-Designer:innen kommunizieren kannst.

Tracking & Datenanalyse

Das Monitoring und Tracking von Softwareprodukten bzw. deren Funktionalitäten ermöglicht es dir den Erfolg deines Produktes zu messen und Warnindikatoren für Fehler zu erkennen. Du erlernst die Konzeption, Definition und Überprüfung relevanter KPI und Metriken.

Qualifikation
Du bist ein Fan von Technologie und kannst Dich für digitale Produkte begeistern
Du bist ehrgeizig und feierst gerne mit Deinem Team Euren gemeinsamen Erfolg
Du hast Spaß an agilen Arbeitsweisen (Scrum, Kanban, Pairing etc.)
Du kannst mit Deinen Visionen Kunden und Stakeholder von Deinen Plänen überzeugen
Du arbeitest gern im Team, zeigst Eigeninitiative und bist pragmatisch
Du hast Freude unternehmerisch zu denken
Du bist mutig — Ungewisse Situationen nimmst Du gerne als Herausforderung an

Benefits
Wir bilden dich innerhalb von 3 Monaten remote/online zum Product Owner aus (deutschsprachig)
Wir unterstützen dich, schon während der Weiterbildung ein Unternehmen zu finden, das dir einen Jobeinstieg während oder nach dem Bootcamp bietet
Die Ausbildung ist berufsbegleitend möglich
Du bekommst einen Mentor, der Dich durch das Programm führt und wirst die Arbeit in Product Teams simulieren
Nach drei Monaten kannst Du als Product Owner mit Zertifikat in digitale Produktteams einsteigen und weißt, was die Aufgaben eines strategisch Produktverantwortlichen sind

Wir freuen uns auf deinen Lebenslauf und deine Bewerbung.

About Revolut

People deserve more from their money. More visibility, more control, more freedom. And since 2015, Revolut has been on a mission to deliver just that. With an arsenal of awesome products that span spending, saving, travel, transfers, investing, exchanging and more, our super app has helped 25+ million customers get more from their money. And we're not done yet.

As we continue our lightning-fast growth, we believe that two things are essential to continuing our success: our people and our culture. So far, we have 5000+ people working around the world, from our great offices or remotely, on our mission. And we're looking for more. We want brilliant people that love building great products, love redefining success, and love turning the complexity of a chaotic world into the simplicity of a beautiful solution.

About The Role

Our Technology team isn’t just one of the best in the industry, it’s one of the best in the world. And we’re proud of it. It’s our driving force; our engine 🚀 From building a new banking backend to creating an award-winning app, there’s nothing (and we mean nothing) our tech team can’t do. Our Technology team isn’t here to fix legacy systems – it’s here to build world-class financial products from the ground up.

Products that will be used by millions of people around the world (18+ million people, not that we’re counting) 🌎

Do you have a weird thing for bugs? No, not insects – the computer ones 🖥

If so, you’re the one for us. We’re looking for a Junior Application Security Engineer to join our Information Security team.

But, it’s not that easy – remember, we Never Settle 💪

You’ll need to be able to show your passion with bug bounty findings, community talks, certifications, and blog posts on your interest.

If this is ‘so you’, you know where to find us… 👀

What You’ll Be Doing
Providing knowledge, experience and support across all our security teams, and wider Technology and Business teams, as well as associated initiatives
Performing source code reviews across Revolut’s projects
Performing web and mobile app security testing
Managing and reviewing external testing and bug bounty programs
Innovating & building tools and solutions to add to our arsenal of security monitoring and testing procedures
Getting involved in the Software Development Life Cycle, embedding security architecture principles and efficient risk-based change review processes to support our product releases
Thinking of and implementing new ways to automate and improve security across our business

What You'll Need
1+ year of experience in the information security field
Experience performing security testing (code review and web/mobile application security testing)
Experience with Java, Swift, Python, Scala
An understanding of the technology stack
An ability to automate and script your work (Python, bash scripts)
A love for solving problems
SAST/DAST skills
The ability to explain complex things in an easy way
An eye for details
Experience developing security tools
To be familiar with automations
An understanding of DevSecOps

Building a global financial super app isn’t enough. Our Revoluters are a priority, and that’s why in 2021 we launched our inaugural D&I Framework, designed to help us thrive and grow everyday. We're not just doing this because it's the right thing to do. We’re doing it because we know that seeking out diverse talent and creating an inclusive workplace is the way to create exceptional, innovative products and services for our customers. That’s why we encourage applications from people with diverse backgrounds and experiences to join this multicultural, hard-working team.

Glue es una empresa atípica, y lo es porque el equipo está en el centro de todo. Sacar lo mejor de cada uno y ayudar a que todos exploten su potencial al máximo es seguramente una de las cosas que mejor hemos hecho. Esta es la esencia de Glue Digital y lo que nos permite, aun siendo pequeños, ayudar a titanes en sus proyectos más relevantes. Actualmente estamos buscando un dev full stack Senior para integrarse en uno de nuestros mejores proyectos.

Responsabilidades:

Escribirás, revisarás y mantendrás código principalmente en lenguajes JS y JAVA, con bases de datos relacionales y no relacionales, arquitecturas hexagonales y grandes volúmenes de datos.
Trabajarás con el equipo de diseño para construir nuevos productos y nuevas funcionalidades.

¿Qué ofrecemos?

Salario competitivo + Incentivos + Shares de las startups que ayudamos a construir.
Trabaja desde donde quieras, Glue Digital es Full Remote.
Seguro médico opcional.
Posibilidad de asistir a eventos internacionales 4YFN, MWC Americas, Websummit, Rise...
Buen ambiente de trabajo, buenas herramientas, poca deuda técnica y proyectos interesantes.
Trabajarás con buenxs diseñadorxs, arquitectxs, developers y project managers, en algunos de los mejores proyectos de algunas de las compañías más grandes del mundo.
Trabajarás en algunos de los topics tecnológicos mas interesantes (Big and Small, Data, PWAs, DLTs, Orquestaciones de Docker y Kubernetes...)
Glue Digital es una empresa naturalmente inclusiva, nos gusta el talento diverso y apoyamos la diversidad en (casi) todas sus formas. Intentamos que sea un lugar donde todo el mundo sea como quiere ser y donde convertise en la mejor version de unx mismx.
Glue tiene una rotación mínima, de las más bajas del sector, esto es por la enorme flexibilidad del entorno, nos adecuamos a tu vida y te dejamos desarrollarla como tú quieras, sin estupideces, puedes trabajar con el equipo que quieras, desde donde quieras y en casi el horario que quieras, solo tienes que hacerlo bien.

Qué pedimos

Al menos 4 años de experiencia desarrollando aplicaciones web.
Experiencia trabajando con frameworks Javascript preferiblemente React (con Redux, Hooks...).
Experiencia con Java Spring Boot.
Experiencia trabajando con bases de datos relacionales y no relacionales.
Experiencia trabajando con GIT, control de versiones, pruebas y Lints, así como otras herramientas de análisis de código.
Interés en el testing, TDD, arquitectura hexagonal y código limpio.
También valoraremos la buena actitud hacia el trabajo y el buen trato. Lo más importante en Glue es el equipo, mantenerlo sano y equilibrado es un trabajo diario del que también formarás parte.
Todo el equipo valorará que te esfuerces por en el trato con los demás, las relaciones son muy importantes, si además de todo lo demás eres unx tipx divertidx pues mejor que mejor.

Appfire is an enterprise collaboration software company that enables teams to plan and deliver their best work. Since launching in 2005 as one of the original Atlassian ecosystem partners, Appfire has built a portfolio of top-selling apps for more than 30,000 customers — including 55% of Fortune 500 companies. As a product-led company, Appfire identifies gaps in industries serving developers and client support teams and then builds solutions that drive productivity and efficiency.

Appfire continues to grow exponentially, with teams spanning 20+ countries. We are financially strong, continuously meeting or exceeding revenue targets, and we invest heavily in strengthening the foundation of our organization. Being philanthropic is integral to operating our business, so we donate 1% of employee time, product, profit, and equity as part of our Pledge 1% commitment.

Come join our team!

Job Purpose And Overview

You will be working with our 7Pace product team and develop and improve our time tracking solution that integrates with the Microsoft environment (Azure DevOps) and on a brand new version of the extension for monday.com. This job will give you a chance of being a part of a cross-functional team that is responsible for the full software development life cycle, from conception to deployment. You will work closely with our Product Owner, Chief Product Architect, Frontend Engineers (on integrating user-facing elements with server-side logic), backend Engineers (.NET), and other software development teams in order to ideate new software solutions and improve existing ones.

As a Backend Node.js Engineer you will be part of our Backend team and you will guide them into Node.js concepts and practices. You will also work on extending the functionality of the solution with Node.js and microservices.

Our tech stack
Frontend: React.js, Redux, TypeScript/JS
Backend: Microservices, C#, ASP.NET Core, Node.js, MSSQL, Azure
Azure DevOps, Github, Docker, Kubernetes

What You Will Need
3 or more years of experience as a Backend or full stack Node.js Engineer (or a similar role)
Proven experience TypeScript, React, REST/JSON API, Node.js
Intermediate knowledge, written and spoken, of English language

Nice to have
Familiarity with Frontend languages and libraries (HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript/TypeScript, React)
Experience with RDBMS design and development (PostgreSQL or MSSQL are preferred)

What will the recruitment process look like?
Initial interview - up to 30 minutes
Technical Interview - up to 60 minutes, out of which 30 to 40 will focus on live coding (you can use your preferred environment)
Final Interview with 7Pace’s Head of Engineering - up to 60 minutes

What We Offer
Every Appfire employee is eligible for company equity
25 paid days off, regardless of years of experience
Flexible working schedule
Development opportunities via our Appfire University

Why a Career at Appfire?

Appfire is a global company of awesome humans working to help teams all over the world. We believe that bold ideas light the way for builders - just like us! Our culture embraces YOUR unique skills, while providing a collaborative, diverse environment that thrives on change and growth for the entire Appfire family! At Appfire, innovators are wanted!

Appfire is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer and we prohibit discrimination or harassment of any kind. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.

Possibilitá di contratto full-time o part-time, 100% smart-working a tempo indeterminato.

Requisiti Tecnici
Esperienza nello sviluppo di Web Service SOAP e RESTful con:
Sviluppo Front End in Javascript (Angular, JQuery/UI, Bootstrap), HTML e CSS;
Sviluppo Back End in Python (Django / Flask)

Sistema operativo Linux/Windows
Git o altri sistemi di gestione dei sorgenti
design pattern (MVC, singleton, factory etc)

MYSQL/MariaDB
PostgreSQL

DynamoDB
MSSQL

conoscenza e utilizzo best practice in materia di security
conoscenza e utilizzo AWS o servizi di altri cloud provider (Azure, GCP)
conoscenza e utilizzo suite di test
esperienza con architetture a Microservices

SOTI is committed to providing its employees with endless possibilities; learning new things, working with the latest technologies and making a difference in the world.

Job Title: Sales Engineer

Location: Belgium

Language requirement: French and English or Dutch and English

Who We Are

At SOTI, we are committed to delivering best in class mobile and IoT device management solutions. We are looking for out of the box thinkers that appreciate the art of creating great software.

To us, being visionary is more important than doing things the way they’ve always been done.

What We’re Looking For

We’re looking for a highly skilled Sales Engineer who is responsible for satisfying the needs of new and existing customers in an effort to maximise their experience with SOTI products. This includes, providing technical support, revenue generation in add-on sales and professional service training and following up on support cases as needed. This position demands a high level of customer service through all interactions as a SOTI representative.

What’s in it for you?

The People - Our people are our most important resource. From our humble origins in our founder’s basement, to our industry leading position today, SOTI has worked hard to foster a company culture that we can all believe in. A culture that emphasises personal growth, continuous innovation and fun.

The Growth - Our environment fosters new ideas, fresh perspectives, and the ability to take them over the goal line. SOTI is a fast-paced environment with a global reach that encourages you to make your mark and be part of something big!

The Technology - You’ll get the chance to work with leading edge technologies and take on complex and interesting projects, as part of highly collaborative and agile teams. You will work alongside SOTI’s partners which include leading tech giants that will keep you on the cusp of emerging technologies.

What You’ll Do

Develop and grow revenue through consultative selling with clients and prospects, presenting a warm, professional, well-spoken and caring persona as an effective representative of SOTI.
Conduct onsite and remote demonstrations of SOTI products.
Ensure continuous learning of changes and new additions in the portfolio of SOTI products.
Provide pre-sales technical support to prospective customers.
Analyse SOTI's market segment and generate recommendations for product roadmaps.
Investigate issues reported by customers and communicate with internal product development teams to resolve product issues.
Provide email and telephone based pre and post-sales, technical support for our software products.
Prepare documentation to facilitate internal and external information sharing about the SOTI product line.
Conduct weekly review meetings with respective Account Managers to review active projects (POC’s).

Experience You’ll Bring

Based pre and post-sales, technical support for any software products.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Knowledge of Javascript ES5/ES6, Jquery mobile, HTML5 – HTML DOM
Solid understanding of computer networking principles (Firewalls, Network Protocols, Subnetting, etc).
Knowledge of mobile computing platforms (Android, iOS and Windows Mobile)
Vertical market expertise within the carrier market.
Able to plan, prioritize and organize workload, consistently working within service standards and agreed objectives.
Prior experience working with mobile device management solutions and enterprise mobility, BYOD, SaaS, Analytics is an asset.
Knowledge of Active Directory, certificates, CRM solutions, Linux, Raspberry Pi is an asset.
Experience with databases, Microsoft SQL server, MY SQL, Oracle is an asset.
Experience with containerization and virtualization is an asset.
Fluent in Dutch, English and any other European language is preferred but not essential.
Successful applicants will be required to undergo a background check.

About SOTI

SOTI is the world's most trusted provider of mobile and IoT management solutions, with more than 17,000 enterprise customers and millions of devices managed worldwide. SOTI's innovative portfolio of solutions and services provide the tools organisations need to truly mobilize their operations and optimise their mobility investments. SOTI extends secure mobility management to provide a total, flexible solution for comprehensive management and security of all mobile devices and connected peripherals deployed in an organisation.

At SOTI, we celebrate the uniqueness of our global teams and are proud to be an equal opportunity workplace. We are curious problem solvers who are committed to bringing the best mobile and IoT management solutions to market.

We offer careers with #EndlessPossibilities.

What are you waiting for? Apply today: https://www.soti.net/careers

If you want to bring your ideas to life, apply at SOTI today.

Please note that SOTI does not accept unsolicited resumes from recruiters or employment agencies. In the absence of a signed Services Agreement with agency/recruiter, SOTI will not consider or agree to payment of any referral compensation or recruiter fee.

Are you looking to be in a workplace where colleagues inspire one another? Are you interested in competitive and impactful benefits? Do you prefer flexible work arrangements?

We’re looking for an (Associate) Data Scientist with 1-3 years of experience in a top tier consultancy or in a high-tech company to join our global Strategy and Business Operations team and help envision our long-term growth plans.

Your Role in Action

Build advanced predictive models for essential metrics to inform management decisions
Conduct advanced data analysis and coordinate with other teams to gather applicable insight related to business operations as well as market dynamics
Partner with department heads and other leaders in the business to complete advanced projects where data science contributes
Master the data ecosystem in the company and can provide insights on how to use it

Your Skills

You feel comfortable working with complex SQL queries and python (pandas/numpy/sklearn/statsmodels)
You love digging into data with the ultimate goal of problem solve for big, challenging strategic questions
You can quickly distill actionable insights from varied sources and often incomplete data
Ability to independently multi-task, efficiently prioritize tasks, and drive projects to completion in a fast-paced, ever-changing environment
Ability to interact with all levels of the organization and across a variety of cultures
You thrive with regular feedback and are hungry to learn
1-3years of data science experience in a business setting

job_title: Assoc Dir, Pharmacometrics - Home based - EUROPE
description:
Description

Assoc Dir, Pharmacometrics

Syneos Health is the only fully integrated biopharmaceutical solutions organization purpose-built to accelerate customer success. We lead with a product development mindset, seamlessly connecting our capabilities to add high-value insights to speed therapies to patients and provide practical value to help our customers achieve their objectives.

Our Clinical Development model brings the customer and the patient to the center of everything that we do. We are continuously looking for ways to simplify and streamline our work to not only make Syneos Health easier to work with, but to make us easier to work for.

Whether you join us in a Functional Service Provider partnership or a Full-Service environment, you’ll collaborate with passionate problem solvers, innovating as a team to help our customers achieve their goals. We are agile and driven to accelerate the delivery of therapies, because we are passionate to change lives.

Discover what our 29,000 employees, across 110 countries already know:

WORK HERE MATTERS EVERYWHERE

Why Syneos Health
We are passionate about developing our people, through career development and progression; supportive and engaged line management; technical and therapeutic area training; peer recognition and total rewards program.
We are committed to our Total Self culture – where you can authentically be yourself. Our Total Self culture is what unites us globally, and we are dedicated to taking care of our people.
We are continuously building the company we all want to work for and our customers want to work with. Why? Because when we bring together diversity of thoughts, backgrounds, cultures, and perspectives – we’re able to create a place where everyone feels like they belong.
Job Responsibilities
Plans, organizes, manages and monitors the sector’s activities/operations according to his/her field of expertise, strategic and tactical alignments, and the needs of the organization in order to achieve the expected results.
Manages all operations activities related to the Pharmacometrics sector.
Provides quotes for all services provided by the team (e.g., Pharmacokinetic/pharmacodynamics analyses, toxicokinetics analyses, additional analyses not included in the original scope of work, etc.)
Provides other consultation services in clinical pharmacology field.
Acts as a pharmacometrician.
Acts as a scientific consultant/clinical pharmacologist for clients, proposing methodologies or performing pharmacometrics analyses (e.g., PK/PD analyses).
Ensure proper training and development of pharmacokineticists and pharmacometricians.
Review/prepare pharmacometric section of study protocols and/or Pharmacometric analysis plans for preclinical or Phase I to IV studies.
Manages human capital including workforce planning and hiring activities, performance management and the daily monitoring of productivity; facilitates knowledge development and transfer; and ensures the efficiency and mobilization of the team in order to achieve the expected results.
Helps develop and analyze the sector’s performance indicator systems according to the established objectives. Identifies opportunities to improve the division and/or service’s master plan and processes. Determines, as needed, the necessary actions in order to increase efficiency.
Contributes to the development of the sector’s budget, ensures that it is being adhered to, performs budget follow-up for pertinent stakeholders and recommends actions in an effort to achieve the expected results.
Communicates the necessary information to keep the team, the organization, and external clients abreast of the sector’s work plan, policies, projects processes, results, and actions and recommendations taken to meet arising needs and to achieve the expected results.
Advises internal/external clients of the division and/or service’s particular areas of expertise by assessing needs, and carrying out analysis and follow-up.
Acts as a consultant and resource person for external clients and Business Development employees with respect to pharmacometric issues.
Acts as a clinical Pharmacologist.
Represents the sector, both internally and externally, as a source for consultation and/or information and/or reference.
Promotes clinical pharmacology services.
Fosters the company’s scientific outreach by attending seminars, writing scientific articles, participating in conventions, interacting with the academic community, etc.
The employee may be called upon to perform other tasks related to their skill set, and for which he/she has been trained.
Qualifications

What we’re looking for
MSc or PhD in Biopharmaceutical Sciences, Pharmacology, Experimental Medicine or in another relevant field.
Word, Excel, and software used in pharmacometrics analyses: WinNonlin, SAS, NONMEM, etc.
Required bilingualism includes communicating verbally and in writing on topics that are often technical, and writing procedures or technical reports.
Candidate who does not possess the required training and/or experience may be considered under different criteria.
Get to know Syneos Health

Over the past 5 years, we have worked with 94% of all Novel FDA Approved Drugs, 95% of EMA Authorized Products and over 200 Studies across 73,000 Sites and 675,000+ Trial patients.

No matter what your role is, you’ll take the initiative and challenge the status quo with us in a highly competitive and ever-changing environment. Learn more about Syneos Health

Additional Information

Tasks, duties, and responsibilities as listed in this job description are not exhaustive. The Company, at its sole discretion and with no prior notice, may assign other tasks, duties, and job responsibilities. Equivalent experience, skills, and/or education will also be considered so qualifications of incumbents may differ from those listed in the Job Description. The Company, at its sole discretion, will determine what constitutes as equivalent to the qualifications described above. Further, nothing contained herein should be construed to create an employment contract. Occasionally, required skills/experiences for jobs are expressed in brief terms. Any language contained herein is intended to fully comply with all obligations imposed by the legislation of each country in which it operates, including the implementation of the EU Equality Directive, in relation to the recruitment and employment of its employees. The Company is committed to compliance with the Americans with Disabilities Act, including the provision of reasonable accommodations, when appropriate, to assist employees or applicants to perform the essential functions of the job.

The Role

We are seeking an experienced individual to join our Global Technology team as a Database Engineer. In this role, you work with a global engineering team to design, develop, and enhance database and ETL related code. You will support and refine database coding standards, and work with development teams to leverage them in practice. The ideal candidate would have deep technical expertise in ANSI SQL, ETL, and modelling development, possess strong organizational and collaboration skills, feel comfortable working across distributed teams worldwide.

What You’ll Do
Work across a geographically split team to deliver global data solutions.
Manage development standards for database development (SQL and ETL)
Collaborate with other teams in enterprise level projects and provide support / guidance as needed
Develop key components/templates for offshore teams, evangelize and educate them
Support of multiple SQL & NoSQL technologies; mainly Oracle & SQL data solutions
Examine database workloads and performance KPIs to tune and implement enhancements
Build and improve automation for release pipelines
Determine the most effective ways to optimize performance of existing solutions
Create and maintain technical documentation.

What You’ll Bring
Expertise in ANSI SQL programming, particularly with SQL Server and Oracle
Expertise in ETL design and development, SSIS and Informatica are key
Performance tuning experience
Exposure to NoSQL and Graph programming
Strong attention to detail
Champion team success over individual accomplishment
Passionate about learning and continuous improvement
Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Engineering or related field required
3+ years of prior technology leadership and development experience
Excellent communication and problem-solving abilities.
Ability to multitasking and quick learning.
Commitment to satisfying internal and external customers
Strong desire to win

Are you looking for a hybrid or remote work opportunity? Are you interested in a workplace that allows for flexibility in your day? Are you ready for a workplace that provides benefits that suit your needs?

The role will implement, maintain, and improve the infrastructure used by development teams. The role will provide delivery process automation as well as work with engineering teams to provide them with guidance and prioritization in the infrastructure automation and optimal usage. The role will provide support and tools to development teams.

The Web Hosting Team

Web Hosting team is responsible for the delivery of a stable platform used for handling content to customers and allowing them to run their extensions to the system. High performance of the solution directly impacts customer experience and is critical for the organization. Team takes care about the whole lifecycle of the solution from the design to sunset. It is responsible for constant monitoring and improvements of the solution as well as preparing the transition to new technologies.

Responsibilities

Analyze our tools and infrastructure to recommend changes to improve processes and performance
Work closely with all development teams to better understand their needs
Provide support to development teams and automation tools
Assist in forecasting future needs by knowing what is coming down the pipeline from the development staff and the product roadmap
Keep on top of industry trends and technology in automation

Your Skills

3+ years of experience in software development/delivery automation
Proven scripting experience (PowerShell, Python, Ruby)
Knowledge of server operating systems – Windows/Linux
Familiarity with cloud-based technologies
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, including the ability to communicate difficult technical concepts in a straight-forward, simple manner
Ability to work in a fast-paced, team-oriented environment
Ability to maintain a calm demeanor when things are going wrong to troubleshoot issues effectively
Experience in software development (plus)
Experience with infrastructure-as-code (plus)
Experience with continuous integration, especially Jenkins (plus)

Relativity is a diverse workplace with different skills and life experiences—and we love and celebrate those differences. We believe that employees are happiest when they're empowered to be their full, authentic selves, regardless how you identify.

Benefit Highlights

Comprehensive health plan

Flexible work arrangements

Two, week-long company breaks per year

Unlimited time off

Long-term incentive program

Training investment program

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, or national origin, disability or protected veteran status, or any other legally protected basis, in accordance with applicable law.

LivePerson (NASDAQ:LPSN) is a leading customer engagement company, creating digital experiences powered by Curiously Human AI. Every person is unique, and our technology makes it possible for companies, including leading brands like HSBC, Orange, and GM Financial, to treat their audiences that way at scale. Nearly a billion conversational interactions are powered by our Conversational Cloud each month.

You'll be successful at LivePerson if you are excited to build something from the ground up. You excel by finding daily opportunities to grow at the same pace as the technology we're building, and you build partnerships that improve our business. Likewise, you're someone who sees feedback as a chance to learn and grow and believe decisions powered by data are the norm. You care about the wellbeing of others and yourself.

Overview

We are part of the Unified Messaging Service (UMS) team. UMS is the main backend messaging platform for LivePerson. It manages asynchronous messaging, but is also involved with auto-messaging, shift schedule management, file upload URL requests, and more. As part of this team, we support three application named Controller Bot, Media Handler, and a messaging SDK. Controller bots handle automated messaging for UMS clients. These bots are programmed and directly managed by the clients themselves, but the ownership related to ensuring their functionality is encapsulated here. Media Handler uploads and downloads of files via UMS. And Messaging SDK is a Node.js pass-through layer for internal and external developers to call UMS APIs.

You Will
Produce and inspire high-quality, well-tested code that is easy to read and maintain. Use technical knowledge to build new features, maintain the platform's stability at LivePerson's scale
Use the latest technologies for our customers on a massive scale
Focus on production readiness including root cause analysis, testing, monitoring, and documentation
Contribute to the team's on-call rotation to improve incident coverage
Work with 1-2 teams and work on important functionalities
Design small to mid-level applications and coordinate with other engineers on the team to build scalable solutions
Attend scrum ceremonies such as sprint grooming, sprint planning, and retrospective, and showcase technical solutions to the team
You Have
Must have at least 1 years of experience on Node.JS
Experience or working knowledge with Google Cloud, Kubernetes, Java, AWS and JavaScript
Benefits
Health: medical, dental, and vision
Time away: 28 vacation days
Development: Native AI learning
Additional: Food Vouchers, monthly phone and internet allowance.
Why You'll Love Working Here

Your entrepreneurial spirit will be supported. We love team members who chase down their big ideas, become experts, help colleagues, and own their work. These four company values guide our continued, holistic growth as individuals, as teams, and as a global organization. And to further make our point, let's just say we're very proud to be on Fast Company's list of Most Innovative Companies and Newsweek's list of most-loved workplaces.

Belonging At LivePerson

At LivePerson, people from diverse backgrounds come together to make an impact and be their authentic selves. One way we share and connect is through our employee resource groups such as: Live In Color, LP Proud, and Women In Tech. We are proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, protected veteran status, race, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws, regulations and ordinances. We also consider qualified applicants with criminal histories, consistent with applicable federal, state, and local law.

We are committed to the accessibility needs of applicants and employees. We provide reasonable accommodations to job applicants with physical or mental disabilities. Applicants with a disability who require a reasonable accommodation for any part of the application or hiring process should inform their recruiting contact upon initial connection.

Mirai es una fintech. Nuestro conocimiento funcional del sector financiero sumado a una amplia experiencia en proyectos tecnológicos nos permite dar soluciones innovadoras a diferentes retos de negocio.
De la mano de un profundo conocimiento del sector y rodeados de un equipo enfocado a la innovación y la excelencia técnica, nació nuestro producto MAT– Mirai ALM Tool – que es una solución nativa en cloud para la gestión de riesgos financieros, concretamente del riesgo estructural de balance o ALM.
Actualmente MAT está implantado y en pleno rendimiento en diferentes clientes a nivel nacional e internacional, y nos encontramos en fase de expansión.
Somos un equipo multidisciplinar especializado tanto en el sector financiero como en todas las capas de un producto digital [diseño, front-end, back-end, data science, big data e infraestructura]. Si algo nos caracteriza como equipo, es la orientación a la calidad y la mejora continua, por eso MAT está en constante desarrollo adaptándolo y actualizándolo a las últimas tecnologías, así como desarrollando múltiples funcionalidades para dar un servicio cada vez más especializado y de mayor calidad a cada uno de nuestros clientes.
Queremos incorporar una persona proactiva con responsabilidades cross a todos los equipos. Punto de encuentro para las mejoras de seguridad y vulnerabilidades, tanto descubiertas por agentes externos como desde sus labores de pentesting.

¿Qué buscamos?

Purple team!
Buenas prácticas de securización de entornos cloud (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud)
Buenas prácticas de desarrollo (OWASP).
Buenas prácticas en desarrollo de software con GIT (gitflow, github-flow, PR, etc).
Conocimientos de pentesting.
Conocimientos en seguridad de contenedores (Docker, Kubernetes, RBAC, ABAC).
Conocimientos de compliance: políticas, legislación y auditoría de seguridad.
Plus: Conocimientos de Zero-Trust.
Plus: JVM y seguridad en Java.
Plus: CKS.
Plus: Supply chain security.

¿Qué vas a hacer?

Se trata de un rol transversal dentro de los equipos, con responsabilidades tanto en entorno Cloud como a nivel global.

Entorno Cloud:

Conocer las herramientas de análisis y auditoría de los principales proveedores cloud (AWS mínimo).
Pentesting a nivel código e infraestructura.
Análisis de la infraestructura y código para mejorar la seguridad.
White box testing.
Análisis y clasificación de alertas de seguridad.
Aplicación de cambios relativos a seguridad dentro de AWS (IAM/SSO/etc).
Reportar a los distintos equipos las vulnerabilidades descubiertas.
Coordinar con el management los tiempos de resolución de vulnerabilidades.

Entorno Global:

Promocionar las buenas prácticas de seguridad en los equipos.
Verificar el compliance: políticas, legislación y auditoría de seguridad.
Administración de las distintas herramientas de seguridad dentro de la compañía.
Apoyo ante incidentes de seguridad, planes de contingencia.

¿Por qué Mirai?

We’re looking for an (Associate) Data Scientist with 1-3 years of experience in a top tier consultancy or in a high-tech company to join our global Strategy and Business Operations team and help envision our long-term growth plans.

Your Role in Action

Build advanced predictive models for essential metrics to inform management decisions
Conduct advanced data analysis and coordinate with other teams to gather applicable insight related to business operations as well as market dynamics
Partner with department heads and other leaders in the business to complete advanced projects where data science contributes
Master the data ecosystem in the company and can provide insights on how to use it
Support portions of our annual strategic planning process (important goals, budgeting)

Your Skills

Hands-on experience in the practical application of statistical methods, including causal inference and predictive modeling
You feel comfortable working with complex SQL queries and python (pandas/numpy/sklearn/statsmodels)
You love digging into data with the ultimate goal of problem solve for big, challenging strategic questions
You can quickly distill actionable insights from varied sources and often incomplete data
Ability to independently multi-task, efficiently prioritize tasks, and drive projects to completion in a fast-paced, ever-changing environment
Ability to interact with all levels of the organization and across a variety of cultures
You thrive with regular feedback and are hungry to learn
1-3years of data science experience in a business setting
Educational background in a quantitative discipline such as statistics, computer science or econometrics
Extra credits for hands-on experience in Big Data frameworks (Databricks, Snowflake, BigQuery)

¡Hola! Soy Víctor, cofundador de Planet 🌍, la única plataforma de automatización y gestión de precios para Shopify en español. Actualmente contamos con más de 500 clientes, con presencia en ¡+65 países diferentes!

Por ello, estamos ampliando nuestro equipo con un programador Front-end para el desarrollo de nuevas funcionalidades para nuestra plataforma. 💻🤙🏻

Qué ofrecemos:
Una oportunidad de escapar de los desarrollos monolíticos. Cada mes lanzamos una funcionalidad nueva, dando pie a progresar con tus conocimientos de desarrollo, y evitar la monotonía de hacer las mismas tareas una y otra vez.
Una organización horizontal donde se tienen en cuenta las diversas opiniones e ideas a la hora de tomar decisiones.
Un entorno de trabajo distendido al máximo. Nos consideramos una familia, y basamos nuestra cultura en la confianza y la cercanía 😊.
El mejor sitio para crecer. Avanzamos rápido, experimentando y aprendiendo juntos.
Horario flexible elegido por la persona. Trabajo por sprints, basado en metodología Scrum.
Salario: 23-27k€ anuales.

Qué puedes esperar de tus primeros meses en Planet:
El primer mes te pondrás a punto para poder desarrollar: aprenderás a usar nuestra plataforma y conocerás sus puntos fuertes y mejorables, prepararás tu entorno de desarrollo y aprenderás a usar las herramientas que tenemos en Front. Podrás ver cómo nos coordinamos e incluso haber colaborado en alguna tarea de desarrollo menor.
En el segundo mes habrás desplegado cambios menores en nuestro sistema de diseño y nuestras extensiones de Shopify con la ayuda de tu mentor.
En el tercer mes te habrás enfrentado a una tarea de desarrollo dentro de nuestra plataforma y para las extensiones de Shopify. Será un mes donde experimentarás a fondo con los stacks de cada entorno.
Al cabo de seis meses esperamos que ya sepas qué se puede y no se puede hacer con la API de Shopify, que participes en el diseño de nuevos addons y que puedas afrontar nuevos desarrollos en la plataforma (siempre con la ayuda de tus compañeros :)).
El objetivo final es que con el tiempo lideres el desarrollos de addons para la sección de automatizaciones, proponiendo soluciones que se adapten a los requisitos y limitaciones de Shopify.

Requisitos técnicos:
Conocimientos demostrables en el desarrollo con Angular o dos años de experiencia laboral en desarrollo web.
El prototipado se desarrolla en Figma y se maqueta en HTML5 y SCSS. Disponemos de una línea de diseño para simplificar este proceso.
Conocimientos básicos de patrones de diseño e interés por desarrollar código que sea fácil de mantener.
La mayor parte de los desarrollos parten de cero, por lo que priman las buenas prácticas. Esto permite ir actualizando las versiones sobre una base sólida y robusta para todo el equipo.
Experiencia con Git.
Conocimientos básicos de MongoDB.
MongoDB es nuestro motor de BBDD principal por lo que cualquier funcionalidad que desarrolles pasará por comunicarte con ella.
Para pruebas, debbuging e incidencias será necesario consultar directamente a la base de datos, por lo que, si tienes experiencia previa te resultará de gran ayuda.
No es necesario conocer todas las tecnologías de nuestro stack, pero sí especial interés por aprender y trabajar con ellas. En el día a día, desarrollarás en Angular@14, pero entrarás en contacto con nuestra infraestructura de AWS, sistema de logs y demás tecnologías.

También, es deseable:
Nos gustan las personas resolutivas, que no tengan miedo a enfrentarse a nuevas situaciones y a trabajar desde la terminal.
El interés por explorar todos los campos y tecnologías es algo esencial; siempre estamos buscando cómo optimizar nuestros procesos, aunque implique integrarnos con otras plataformas o usar otras librerías.
El inglés es algo esencial. Desarrollarás funcionalidad para una plataforma que se usa por todo el mundo; por lo que ayudar en la internacionalización de los textos y tener en cuenta el formateo de números y moneda es parte del día a día.

wethod è una Single Page Application che aiuta le persone a collaborare in modo intelligente sui progetti più disparati.
Proponiamo una nuova visione di gestione aziendale grazie ad un software sviluppato internamente in H-FARM.
Siamo un team indipendente e promuoviamo un nuovo approccio al management: distribuito, condiviso e adatto ai tempi moderni. Affianchiamo agenzie creative, studi di architettura e d'ingegneria, software house, società di consulenza e aziende orientate a progetti nell’adozione dell’approccio organizzativo più adatto a loro, applicando un nuovo metodo che sceglie le regole in base al contesto in cui opera.

Chi cerchiamo:
Con l’obiettivo di crescere e migliorare, stiamo cercando un nuovo Full Stack Developer per il nostro team dev; sei la figura ideale se hai un’esperienza pregressa nel settore e una ottima conoscenza del funzionamento di una web app.
Ti occuperai della manutenzione e dell’evolutiva della nostra applicazione in sinergia con il nostro grandioso team Dev!
Skill richieste:
Princìpi di funzionamento di una Web App
HTML
JavaScript
React
CSS
PHP
Symfony (preferibile) o Laravel
PostgreSQL (preferibile) o SQL
Skill plus:
Doctrine
AWS
Docker
Redux
Ovviamente non ti stiamo chiedendo di fare volontariato: la RAL verrà stabilita in base al tuo livello di esperienza e al grado di autonomia/supporto che potrai offrire al resto del team - vuoi un’idea di massima? Tra i 25.000 e i 40.000€ annui in base alle tue competenze.

Il nostro team non vede l’ora di crescere, e per questo stiamo cercando una persona che sia disponibile da subito.

Siamo per un'altissima flessibilità di spostamento, ovvero il nostro team lavora e si coordina senza problemi da remoto, ma ogni volta che serve ci fa piacere incontrarci nel campus di H-FARM a Roncade.

Ora, se sei arrivato fin qui e credi essere la persona giusta manda la tua candidatura! Ti aspettiamo.
